scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && npm run build:TW
scripts.build:prepare: mkdir -p build/ && cp node_modules/tiddlywiki/editions/server/tiddlywiki.info build/ && node bin/updateVersion.js
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.serve:start: npm run serve:stop && tiddlywiki ++./plugin build --verbose --listen || echo killed
scripts.serve:listen-changes: chokidar "plugin/**/*.tid" "plugin/**/*.js" -c "npm run build && npm run serve:start" --initial
scripts.serve: npm run serve:open-browser-delayed && npm run serve:listen-changes
